title: 2006 Asia-Pacific Rally Championship
text: The 2006 <a href="Asia-Pacific%20Rally%20Championship">Asia-Pacific Rally Championship</a> season (APRC) was an international <a href="Rallying">rally</a> championship organized by the <a href="FIA">FIA</a>. The champion was <a href="Australia">Australia</a>n driver <a href="Cody%20Crocker">Cody Crocker</a>.
